sentences.en: {"COLLOINEXA":["metal fatigue"]}
sentences.cn: 金属疲劳

sentences.en: Although fatigue shows readily on Carter, he bounces back quickly.
sentences.cn: 卡特虽然容易显出疲劳的样子, 但他恢复得很快.

sentences.en: Chronic fatigue is also one of the salient features of depression.
sentences.cn: 慢性疲劳也是抑郁症的显著特点之一。

sentences.en: Coca is well-known for reducing hunger, thirst and fatigue.
sentences.cn: 人们都知道可乐能消饿、止渴和解乏。

sentences.en: Everyone has analogy fatigue at this point.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上，人人都有类比疲劳。

sentences.en: Fatigue predisposes one to colds.
sentences.cn: 疲劳使人易患感冒.

sentences.en: He nearly died away with fatigue.
sentences.cn: 他累得几乎昏倒.

sentences.en: He was punch-drunk with fatigue and depressed by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪，头昏沉沉的，因为下雨情绪也很低落。

sentences.en: He’s suffering from physical and mental fatigue.
sentences.cn: 他身心交瘁。

sentences.en: I have got over my weakness and fatigue.
sentences.cn: 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了.

sentences.en: physical and mental fatigue
sentences.cn: 身体和精神的疲劳

sentences.en: Reactions were slowed by fatigue.
sentences.cn: 疲劳使反应变得迟缓。

sentences.en: Sam’s face was grey with fatigue.
sentences.cn: 萨姆累得脸色灰白。

sentences.en: She continued to have severe stomach cramps, aches, fatigue, and depression.
sentences.cn: 她仍然患有严重的胃痉挛，感觉疼痛、疲乏、抑郁。

sentences.en: She hoped to sleep off her fatigue.
sentences.cn: 她希望睡一觉之后会消除疲劳。

sentences.en: She was plagued by weakness, fatigue, and dizziness.
sentences.cn: 她感觉体虚、疲倦、头昏眼花。

sentences.en: She works hard as if she never knew fatigue.
sentences.cn: 她工作努力,仿佛从不知疲倦似的.

sentences.en: Some of the men were obliged to fall out from fatigue.
sentences.cn: 一些人因疲乏而掉队了.

sentences.en: Symptoms of anaemia include weakness, fatigue and iron deficiency.
sentences.cn: 贫血的症状包括虚弱、疲劳和缺铁。

sentences.en: The old lady can't bear the fatigue of a long journey.
sentences.cn: 这位老妇人不能忍受长途旅行的疲劳.

words.tran_cn: [生理][心理][力]使疲劳；使心智衰弱

phrases.tran_cn: 慢性疲劳综合征；慢性疲劳症候群
疲劳失效；疲劳破坏；疲劳断裂
